pages.text: The $(item)Wrench/$ is one of the most useful tools you can have while building contraptions, as it lets you easily pick up or rotate mechanical blocks. See the item tooltip for more information.
$(item)Metal Sheets/$ can be created using the $(bold)$(item)$(l:getting_started/devices#press)Mechanical Press/$.

The $(item)Engineer's Goggles/$ let you see more information about mechanical devices and systems when looking at them, such as stress generation and consumption. The goggles can be worn either in the helmet slot or in the $(thing)Curios/$ head slot.

$(item)Superglue/$ can be used to attached blocks together when building $(bold)$(l:contraptions)Contraptions/$.$(ponder)$(br2)$(item)Slime Balls/$ can be crafted to save you the trouble of finding slimes early on.
